thread.title: Mirae Asset Global to Acquire U.S. ETF Issuer Global X

author: Asjylyn Loder
title: Mirae Asset Global to Acquire U.S. ETF Issuer Global X
text:
Global X, a U.S. ETF issuer with $10.2 billion in assets as of Jan. 31, is being acquired by Mirae Asset Global Investments, both companies announced Tuesday.
Terms of the deal werenâ€™t disclosed. Mirae will acquire complete control of Global X, including the minority stake purchased by JPMorgan Chase & Co. in 2016.
